1.「あニャ？ そこにいるのは| <pc>じゃないかニャ。: Uh-oh. There you are.<pc> It's not...

10.「だが 残念だったニャ <pc>ーー！！: But I'm sorry, Meow<pc> Oh, my God!

... The meeting was a coincidence... I was|traveling in the sky... We met here... We met|here, but me and him, we didn't say a word,|
|we drew our swords.

19.「そうと決まれば さっそく| 永遠の地下迷宮の広間へ 向かうニャ。| <pc>も: Once that's decided, we'll head for the halls|of the Eternal Labyrinth...<pc> I'm sure they'll be here soon.

21.「<cs_pchero>が来るのが おそいんで| ちょっと奥で 狩りをしてたニャ: <cs_pchero>I was a little late getting here, so I hunted|a little further back...
